urls.description: We are making improvements to Public Registers Online and are looking for users who would be happy to take part in some user research. If you would be interested in taking part, please contact DSPcustomerforum@environment-agency.gov.uk. beta This is a trial service ‚Äì your feedback will help us to improve it. Home Search waste carriers, brokers and dealers People or businesses who transport, buy, sell or dispose of waste, or arrange for someone else to do so, must be registered. To check a registration,
